creator: hbutturff@erols.com
text:
You must specify a url-pattern in servlet-mapping of web.xml,
and the client must reference the url-pattern (instead of
"servlet/ServletClassName"), to get a non-null result from 
ServletConfig.getInitParameter() and 
ServletConfig.getInitParameterNames().

You must refer to the servlet name, as defined in <servlet> declaration.
It seems to work fine - please include a web.xml fragment if it doesn't for you.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
